name: Soul
description:
Play as Timmy-chan also known as Soul to collect the lost souls over the country.

Use the telekinetic power they reward you to solve the mistery of life.
Help them to achieve afterlife.

This game was done for the Global Game Jam 2016 as Nugget Team.

Programming

Joan Soler "Relos" Pla ->http://gamejolt.com/profile/joanrelos/47900
José Pascual Manzano Pérez
Guillem Soler Pasqual

Game Design

Jesús Ramírez Bas -> http://gamejolt.com/profile/xuso74/1083731

Art

Special thanks to Irene for making the background music.
